attributes.action: STOP ALL NHS workers being TAXED
attributes.additional_details: Because it’s only fair these people are in the frontline risking and saving life’s daily instead of paying them more to be taxed more completely stop them being taxed for the same amount of time the 80% rule is put in place
attributes.background: stop all nhs workers taxes for as long as they are paying 80% to people who are not able to go to work or 80% of self employed peoples income

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/304595

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
